summary: THE VEHICLE WAS STILL RUNNING  AFTER THE KEY WAS REMOVED FROM THE IGNITION.  THE NEXT DAY, THE CONSUMER COULD NOT ENGAGE THE VEHICLE AT ALL.  THE DEALER DIAGNOSED THAT BRAKE FLUID LEAKAGE CONTACTED THE MASTER CYLINDER CREATING A POSITIVE CHARGE RESULTING IN THE CAR NOT SHUTTING OFF. THE DEALER REPLACED MASTER CYLINDER.         *JB
